effect.lydialib.berserk.description: Increases the attack damage of the user the lower their current health points are.
effect.lydialib.ferrymans_blessing.descr: Teleports the user to their last death location if they have one.
effect.lydialib.heartbreak.description: Decreases the maximum amount of health points of the user.
effect.lydialib.lava_walking.description: Allows the user to stand on lava.
effect.lydialib.magnetism.description: Pulls items in towards the user.
effect.lydialib.no_death_point: Cannot find a valid death location to teleport to.
effect.lydialib.no_spawn_point: Cannot find a valid spawn location to teleport to.
effect.lydialib.perception.description: Grants glowing to all entities nearby the user.
effect.lydialib.repulsion.description: Pushes items away from the user.
effect.lydialib.traversal.description: Teleports the user to their spawn point if they have one set.
effect.lydialib.water_walking.descriptio: Allows the user to stand on water.
